titleStmt.title: Choice, chance, and change: or, Conceites in their colours
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Bradock] for Nathaniell Fosbrooke, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Helmet,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Choice, chaunce, and change.
Identified as STC 5142 on UMI microfilm reel 1167.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1167 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1477 (Bodleian Library copy).

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Helmet
